Translations.Text: Bwa Katonda yekka obufuzi bwe ggulu omusanvu ne nsi, era era bubwe olunaku lw’enkomerero lwelituuka, olunaku olwo abonoonyi balifafaganirwa

(Kwolwo) oliraba buli kibiina nga kifukamidde (olwokutya). Buli kibiina kiriyitibwa okugenda awali ekitabo kyakyo (ekyo ekirimu emirimu gyabwe era baligambibwa nti) olwaleero muli ba kusasulwa ebyo bye mwali mukola
(Era baligambibwa nti) ekitabo kyaffe kino kiboogerako mu mazima (anti) mazima ffe twawandikanga buli kye mwakolanga
Olwo nno abaakola emirimu emirongoofu Mukama omulabirizi waabwe ali bayingiza mu kusaasira kwe (era) ekyo kwe kwesiima okweyolefu
Ate abo abakafuwala (Katonda alibagamba nti) abaffe ebigambo byange tebyabasomerwa ne mwekuluntaza ne mubeera abantu abonoonyi

Era bwe mwagambwanga nti ddala endagaano ya Katonda ya mazima era nti ekiseera ekyenkomerero tekiriimu kubuusabuusa, mwagamba nti ekiseera ekyenkomerero tetumanyi kye ki. (Ebikikwatako) tuwammanta biwammante, era ffe tetukirinaako bukakafu
Era (awo) obubi bwebyo bye bakola buli beeyoleka era biribebungulula ebibonerezo byebyo bye baali bajeeja
Era baligambibwa nti olwaleero tubeerabidde nga bwe mwerabira okusisinkana olunaku lwa mmwe luno, era omuliro bwe butuulo bwa mmwe era temugenda kufuna badduukirize

Ekyo nno mmwe (ekibatuusaako) lwakuba nti mazima mmwe ebigambo bya Katonda mwabifuula bya kujeeja era obulamu bwe nsi ne bubagayaaza, n’olwekyo olwaleero si bakugujjibwamu (omuliro) era tebagenda kugambibwa kwetonda
Ebitendo byonna bya Katonda Mukama omulabirizi we ggulu omusanvu, era Mukama omulabirizi we nsi, Mukama omulabirizi w’ebitonde byonna
Ebitiibwa byonna mu ggulu omusanvu ne nsi bibye yekka, era yye, ye nantakubwa ku mukono mugoba nsonga
